website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for consumers who want to give PopSockets a try or want to save a bit of money, as it has an attractive design and one of the lowest prices.
pros: Sports an intricately detailed design on black background
Somewhat lower priced than other PopSockets
cons: The top occasionally comes off, and the adhesive could be stronger
Some consumers received a different pattern/color than expected

customer_reviews.title: Cheap piece of junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of crap. Fell off after two days. The “use as a stand” is completely false since it just pops back in. My friend used one , and hers was fine. It might stick better to a bare phone. It doesn’t stick to any case plastics. The one my friend bought stayed on her otter box for a year. Mine like a day. Prepare to do what I did and gorilla glue it on your device :-)
customer_reviews.author: Your Personal Warlock

customer_reviews.title: No adhesive included!? Don't buy. Cheap piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a pop socket for a while now. I finally ordered one with some Christmas money. I received my pop socket today and was excited to use it, but couldn't. There was ZERO adhesive included. WTF?! Now I have to go buy some 3M and spend MORE money for an item not even worth the $9.00 paid. Update, Inbought my own 3M to attach it to my phone....it broke withing 6 hours. Picture shown, and circled where it broke. I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Kim J.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying !
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this popsocket at all. It was pretty but saw no use for it at all. I thought I could put it between my fingers to help hold my phone but you can't. Then I thought I could prop my phone up with it but it dosen't pop out enough so it barley stands your phone up at all ! I did give it 3 stars but that was only because Amazon customer service was so helpful and removed my charge and I thank them for that !
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought Popsockets many times before, but I've never gotten one like this. This Popsockets doesn't expand the whole way, it's much smaller than any I've seen, and the colors aren't crisp. It seems to only expand once, not twice. My tweens fingers can't even fit to wrap around it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heatherrenea

customer_reviews.title: fantastic popsocket but i still prefer the ring-style holder
customer_reviews.text: I love the blue and aqua design. it goes great with my blue phone case. this is my very first popsocket. I've always used a ring. I do like it but i'm torn between this and the ring holder. the ring can be slipped on a finger and you still have use of your entire hand to hold something else. the popsocket definitely makes it easier to hang onto my phone than having nothing else. but in the end I think i'll go back to a ring-style holder. just my personal preference. Nothing against this popsocket or seller. the product works like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Adheres well.  I feel my phone is safe.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this. My hands are small but I do need a 32 GB phone and they do seem on the large side. This works perfect and can actually be used as a stand as well. The adhesive seems strong. They say it can be switched to another case but, we all know what happens to any adhesive that is reattached to another surface. I have trust issues. I’ll get a new one! Besides it won’t match a new case..
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Sticks well and moves well to! I would so buy one again when I need one and Came in great shape, thanks and a happy 2018. Btw I know the other photo is not the I took, had to find one exactly like the one I bought because the socket is on my phone but if I love it than you will to.
customer_reviews.author: CAIN

customer_reviews.title: Loved the artwork on it but would not stay stuck!
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was super pretty but I could not get it to stay stuck on my case. The case wasn't anything unusual or difficult to stick. My daughter (not knowing) actually held onto the popsocket to hand to me and the thing came unstuck which caused my phone to fall and screen crack:( Every time I popped it out to slide my fingers in and hold it it would unstick and fall off. Very frustrating. I even ordered a replacement thinking I had a faulty one but the second one behaved just like the first...and I even tried a super smooth case (a second one). Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Ranya

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this popsocket. It's great quality and it's beautiful. I have issues with my hands with holding things. I have arthritis in my hands so it helps to hold my phone with one of these. The adhesive is very sticky and sticks to phone very well. I love that they pop open and easy to pop back down to size. Helps my hand not hurt so much when I am on the phone working. The best thing is the price is awesome! Highly worth it. I highly recommend seller and this product
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene Gail Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick to case after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to reattach it to my phone case and it will not stick. I used it about 3 months before it stopped sticking to my case. I would recommend to offer an extra sticky glue patch with purchase. It collapses when I try to use it to watch a video. I would recommend that it twist to lock it in place so it doesn’t collapse.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: this thing last FOREVER
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to change phonecases ( I cracked the case).. it took some tuggin to get it off and we tried to stick it back to the new one but it did not stick for long .. I have had this for I think a year so I was sad to see it . I think I bought another from here but a different design. I came on here to but the same one again but found another one I loved more ! haha
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a while, but not long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a little under a year, but had difficulties. The ridges that hold the designed circle broke and I just kept sticking it back in everytime it came out. There was no way it could hold it anymore, so I decided to remove it, and have not had a phone holder since that day. It worked while it lasted, but again, caused difficulty with the circle coming off. Considering just getting another one that is the same, but I don't know if I will be or not. This was my first one ever and I don't know what to think of my experience. It was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: So I used this for about a week and then the hard outer part with the design just broke off in pieces when I was gripping to pull it out. It says ‘this item is not returnable’!! I did not drop the phone or anything. Plus I already bought the holder for the dash of my car :((.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Nansel

customer_reviews.title: It broke
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even get it on my phone before the expandable circle popped off of the base. The cover is nice and I might put it on a real pop socket but I'm going to have to get a new one and this time I'll spend the 10 bucks at a store.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: I didn't buy one, but two!
customer_reviews.text: My fingers are thin and my grip is not too big, not made for handling rough big things, so I was concerned about putting "handles" on my phone, but these are definitely great! They hold tight, they collapse an adjust to many uses (recline, hang, you get it) and stick nicely to the back of my phone cover. Plus the mandala design is just too cute to go without it. I got not one, but two, and it has positively impacted the uses I give my phone. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I picked up this popsocket phone holder because my pinkie finger was weirding out with holding my phone for things like selfies. So I looked around and found this type holder, which seems very popular right now, but after using it I can see why they are so popular. It works well to just help hold my phone, it is great for propping up to watch shows AND not having to use a stand! I am totally in love and so glad I am tried it out! I would totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: froggys109

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter a couple of years ago and it is still holding up. She loves it and it is so cute. It has held up longer than her cover for her I-pod. The colors are still just as vibrant as the day we got it. The suction and grip are great. I would definitely recommend purchasing this! Pop sockets are so fun!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Stays on much better than the rip off version I purchaed in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Stays on much better than the rip off version I purchaed in a drug store. It is also easier to open and close. This one still uses sticky stuff to mount to the phone, which is ok as I am still not too trusting of the ones with magnets... people say that is basic "whatever the word for people that understand)n but have used them in the past so... Anyways this one offers so many different designs, there is no reason for everyone not to have one.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Cute, practical, and worth it.
customer_reviews.text: One side of mine keeps popping out... Seems like the top of it has a few little plastic pieces to hold to the rubber socket piece and one may be broken. It's been like this since I received it, but it hasn't been bad enough for me to try and rip it off and put a new one on. Super cute options though! Love it for texting, taking pictures, and showing people things on my phone. Takes strain off my small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Alizabeth Longe

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick to my case
customer_reviews.text: So this thing refuses to stick to my phone case. I have an off brand otter box, and it won’t stick to the rubber part of my case. So I tried it on a real otter box and it still would not stick...pretty disappointing. Idk if it’s the pop socket being defective or it’s the case? I have had other pop sockets and they all stuck so idk what this ones probblem is.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Solid popsocket
customer_reviews.text: The popsocket works great... the pull and push feel is stiff enough that I'm confident in holding the phone with it, but not so stiff that its hard to utilize. I've gotten compliments on the design and color. After 6 months of use the popsocket still looks great, with great adhesion.
customer_reviews.author: Squishy

customer_reviews.title: The adhesive doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: My deadline to return was 8/17 and the adhesive died 8/25. <insert eye roll> My previous pop socket lasted 2 years. I got a new phone and a new case, so had to get a new socket. Prepped with alcohol wipe and used the same kind of otter box case - so it’s not user error. I’m annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Product changed - new adhesive doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: GARBAGE. They've changed their product. I bought one a year ago and it was advertised as "removeable" and IT WAS! It used to be a great product. I re-stuck that thing several times and mistakenly threw it out to change the look up with a new one. Big mistake. The adhesive used to be thicker and squishy kind of like command hook adhesive. This adhesive is paper thin and fell off after seconds. I bought another hoping this was a fluke and it lasted less than a week. No idea why they changed but this product is awful now. You are paying for a plastic disc with the adhesive of a used envelope.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Three weeks since I purchased and it has already broken. The top popped off and went missing, making it useless.
customer_reviews.author: Trish L

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my phone well before sticking it. Dropped my phone on my face after two days because it became unstuck. Super glued it to my case. Within a month the plastic top chipped a chunk off. My boyfriends free one has lasted like two years. Got a free one from brew fest and it’s lastig longer than this one had any hope of.
customer_reviews.author: Rob n Em

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT STAY STUCK
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst pop socket I’ve ever had. I’ve never had an issue before but this one just will not stick and stay stuck! Very disappointed since I have loved pop sockets in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Kaley L

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product, it broke before I could use it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst pop socket I have ever bought. It only has one level to pop out, but before I could even try it it broke. I say buy another kind.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Dont
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. Bummer. Super uncomfortable and cheep. Really disappointed it's not returnable. Just don't. It's not what you think it is.
customer_reviews.author: Living Conscious

customer_reviews.title: Accurate color depiction.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the colors of this pop socket. The colors are the same in person as they are in the picture which I was really happy about because I matched my phone to the one I chose. I also love the design. It was very easy to put on my phone and makes holding my phone much more easy and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Wont stick like my original
customer_reviews.text: Man I was thoroughly disappointed. My original popsocket snapped at the base but I never had issues w it sticking to my case. I got this one and despite fully cleaning my case (then letting it sit overnight) this one is STRUGGLING to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I immediately noticed that it wouldn't extend all the way so it doesn't stay open when you use it as a stand to watch videos or else! After 2 weeks the top was partially coming off! I removed it from my phone 3 weeks after applying it cause there's no point! Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Isa

customer_reviews.title: This particular item was not the sturdiest.
customer_reviews.text: The popsocket piece come off of where to hear to the back of the phone case after the first second month of it being on. The adhesiveness to the back of the phone works extremely well, but it appears to be for smaller fingers instead of those of us that have larger
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I will never get this brand of popsocket again. Almost every time I 'pop' it out it comes apart. It even comes in 2 separate pieces in the package. Don't waste your money on this piece of junk. It is so annoying to have it fly off almost every time I try to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Easier to hold phone
customer_reviews.text: I love having a PopSocket on my phone. Makes it much easier to hold my phone. Although, the one I received is a bit...crooked when extended all the way out. You have to turn it and get it just right if you want to set the phone on the table and have it not fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Cromer

customer_reviews.title: Just bought it to try it out & worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I bought it to try it out because of the hype and wanted to see if it really works or not. Turns out, it does and it's very handy. I'm really glad I bought it cause I tend to drop my phone a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: Awesome PopSocket
customer_reviews.text: I love this pop socket. I had never thought I would want one until I tried it and its great. Its so much easier to hold my phone with one hand and not worry about dropping it. Its also works great as a phone stand when im watching something on the phone and dont want to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve uninstalled and reinstalled at least 3, times and it maintains its stick power. I’m impressed. This is also one of those things that you never knew you needed until you got it and then you realize that you have to have one because you can’t live without it.
customer_reviews.author: Maya W.

customer_reviews.title: doesn't stick
customer_reviews.text: I've had many popsockets but for some reason this one has awful sticking ability. cjeaned the surface, stuck it properly, but it won't stay on. now I have to buy separate stickies. annoying
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: its pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty, nice to hold your phone in your hand with the pop,you can prop your phone sideways and watch it. Mine ended up tearing at the one of the holes so the pop wouldn't stay in its place anymore but you can still use the pop socket without the mandala.
customer_reviews.author: cwdancer89

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy! As soon as i attached it to my phone case and went to pop it open it completely broke in 2. I dont expect items used this oftan to last long, but i could not use it at all.
customer_reviews.author: jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Essential for large phones
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing I have it on my phone right now I have had this pop up for more than six months and it holds perfect. I have removed it and put it back on and it still holding up really well. I can’t even imagine not having it it is something I use every day.
customer_reviews.author: Qness

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this PopSocket attached to my phone for five months now and have nothing bad to say about it at all. It stays attached and is comfortable to hold. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: The sticky party didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Although this item is very cute...the sticky part to help it stick has become less sticky & has started to fall off. The pop it itself is great quality...maybe just better adhesive needs to be sent with it
customer_reviews.author: Ariel E Arancibia

customer_reviews.title: popsocket
customer_reviews.text: Was used extensively to stabilize her cell phone while she was washing dishes. She kept up with a Japanese cartoon or 'Dr. Who' while doing a chore at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: jmaier

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and I love the pattern and color. Only complaint I do have is sometimes the pop socket falls right off my phone. It always sticks back on but can be a real inconvenience sometimes because I've almost dropped my phone when it's fallen off while using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mars18

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting to last at least 1 yr, but it didn’t !
customer_reviews.text: After almost 9 months the hard plastic cap no longer holds to the rubber piece. Don’t know what’s the life expectancy for this type of product, but my expectation was to be around 1 yr. To be fair, adhesion to the phone case is still good, but with the loose hard plastic plate the socket is unusable
customer_reviews.author: christina Haiduc

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied! Cant use it.--see REVISION- NO INSTRUCTONS
customer_reviews.text: There is no sticky adhesive on the one I received in the mail!! Used or reject or ?? REVISION -- there were no instructions, but I finally was able to peel the "invisible" layer of adhesive off & I'm using it. I just didn't give up. IT SHOULD NOT BE THIS HARD!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great popsocket - pretty pattern!
customer_reviews.text: I love this popsocket!! Its really pretty without being super bright and works great on my phone. This is the 2nd popsocket I've had (only got another one because I got a new case and wanted a new pattern), so I already know these work well and stay for a long time. Highly recommend for anyone who triesto do everythibg one handed!
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: So it broke before I even removed it from the packaging. The bottom part broke in half when I was just trying to pop it out. I ended up still sticking it on and its worked ok for a couple of weeks. It’s still on my phone now but I’ve already bought another pop socket to replace this one. I think it is authentic and not a fake but pretty disappointing it broke before I even unpackaged it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Get super glue
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive that came on it didn’t stick to my phone case. I had to super glue it myself. I haven’t found a pop socket that sticks and stays yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Arrival
customer_reviews.text: This pop socket took a very long time to arrive. By the time it arrived I did not want it any more. This was a waste. It did look nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Greta Jeska

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had one other pop socket before this and it stuck on for a good year without coming off even if I tried. This one gave me problems from the start. The face of it kept popping out of the base when I tried to pop it open from the beginning. Now it keeps shifting and falling off after about a month and a half of attaching it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Design, Awesome in Use
customer_reviews.text: I have used my pop socket for many many months now. I love it. I know people make fun of them, but honestly, I can grip my phone better, watch videos while cooking dinner, hook it into the holder of my car for the GPS and listening to music. It is perfect and everyone who owns a phone should have one!
customer_reviews.author: Kels

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold...adhesive loses stickiness quickly
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors. Easy to hold. Very sturdy until it started losing the stickiness and the back design part kept popping off
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bit skeptical after reading some of the reviews but decided to purchase it anyway because I loved the design. What I received is exactly as pictured. It stuck to my case perfectly and it feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Red Empress

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 5 months. I bought this product in June and it's already broken. The only thing that keeps this piece together is a magnet that I added when I bought it. See picture.
customer_reviews.author: IMG

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: I returned the first one (my first ever Amazon return) because it barely stuck on. This second one is a lot better, though it struggles sometimes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good item but wore out
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product and the only reason I gave it 4 stars and not 5 was because the edges became white and worn out after a month. Loved the design though...
customer_reviews.author: Eryn Field

customer_reviews.title: Great adhesion!
customer_reviews.text: Attractive. Collapses down well to minimize bulk. Holds my phone securely for photos. Once on, it is permanent. After years of use, I tried to pry it of to reuse, and could not get it to budge! Impressive.
customer_reviews.author: InGaltCa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I love popsockets! I dont know how I ever got along without them! The only reason I gave this a 4 star is because the color was not as advertised. It's still a pretty color, but it's more of a light blue than teal.
customer_reviews.author: Erin J.

customer_reviews.title: This is not an authentic pop socket!
customer_reviews.text: This item was very hard to fold / unfold and it broke the very next day. I don’t think it's authentic as pop sockets are usually very durable and hight quality. I do not recommend this particular item
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: defective?
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t pop open enough to hold it comfortably. I’m forced to have my hand right against my phone. I’m used to the kind you can get at target, even Walmart, that pop open farther away from your phone. They have much more space for your hands. Is mine defective?
customer_reviews.author: Rileigh Nalley

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Make sure to choose your spot on the phone cover wisely because once it sticks, it hangs on for life and will never move again ;)
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have used a couple of Popsockets before so knew I needed one when the old one was getting loose. After getting this one, it is still holding strong since last 6 months. It is sturdy and the design looks very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this brand before and it always stays put and in good shape. I've tried other brands and other types of finger holds and I always keep coming back to this one. The only time I ever need to buy a new one is if I get a new phone or feel like a design change
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to reposition it a few of times to get it in the right spot. On the last reposition it came apart, but it also snapped back together. After two weeks it holds fine. My sister got a ring for her phone and I feel that hers is a little more comfortable to hold. Still I like that it matches my case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy & practical
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Cute. Sturdy. Practical. It helps me keep my phone held so I can read my kindle app before bed comfortably. Would be great for kids (& adults..) who tend to drop their phone often.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Z

customer_reviews.title: This thing lasted years!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few years ago for my daughter, it's still in great condition with very heavy use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty design, just not my thing.
customer_reviews.text: The design was beautiful. Quality is fine. It's just not for me. I tried it out for a couple days but it didn't feel practical for me and my galaxy S9.
customer_reviews.author: dotpsc

customer_reviews.title: Lasts about
customer_reviews.text: This really makes it easy to avoid dropping my phone; however, the plastic top with the madala design that creates the stability for use broke off after about 6 months so it became trash
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this daily for 9 months, and it still works like new! The back is still sticky if I want to switch cases, and the print hasn't faded at all. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: Holds the Phone Nicely
customer_reviews.text: Attractive design and holds the phone well. Worth the price, because I bought a less expensive one and it broke In one day.
customer_reviews.author: KMharford

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not a good deal for the money, it does not stick well.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Pop socket
customer_reviews.text: It worked great on a flat surface but if you phone case has texture, it's a no go.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Popsockets are so handy. I love how I can hold onto my phone easier. My hand doesn't cramp up this way. I don't drop my phone as easy now being able to have a better grip on it. It's also nice having a stand to prop my phone up when needing to watch something.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: Only one thing I dislike. It doesn’t work well as a stand for my iPhone 6 when it is vertical. Just falls over. Works great when phone horizontal.
customer_reviews.author: Franny

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the cute design and I don’t think I could ever have another phone case without a pop socket, lol. It’s so much easier to hold my phone now!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and it adheres well even when i transferred it from one case to Another.
customer_reviews.author: JNSA

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute popsocket! Both my daughter and I love it! It does stay well on a textured case. It looks great on a black case.
customer_reviews.author: MN Customer

customer_reviews.title: yep, works great
customer_reviews.text: mine falls off every now and again, but I just wet it slightly and stick it back onto my otterbox!
customer_reviews.author: Heather McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I received lots of compliments on this, but it broke in half after 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiD702

customer_reviews.title: Great item for smooth case.
customer_reviews.text: Nice pop sockets for a smooth case. It didn't not fit my rough case. But over all it was very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & functional
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone holder! Makes holding the phone so much easier. And it's stylish,too.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Baird

customer_reviews.title: Great product (if you have self control)
customer_reviews.text: I played with the socket so much thay it didn't stay down anymore. One day, it was stuck open and in my back pocket, when I caught it on a will, which ripped the socket from the base. I'm not blaming the product, but it was unfortunate. I bought a new, customized one directly from the pop socket website and have had no trouble since.
customer_reviews.author: KayLee Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design and it sticks better than others I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: My husband put it in his back pocket and the part you pop out came off. It popped back in a few times but didn't work very well after that.... So now I have the part you stick on your case stuck back there.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Flowers

customer_reviews.title: I love it 😍
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for months and still am using the same one
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Kinney

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't STICK!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed, I've had a number of pop sockets in the past, that stuck so well they were hard to remove when you wanted to remove them, the last one I had for a couple years. Not this one, it seems to be stuck on good but then I'll be holding it between my fingers and it just comes off. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Chris Maahs

customer_reviews.title: No bueno!! Doesn’t work well.
customer_reviews.text: Product is poorly made my phone kept falling . Adhesive didn’t hold waste of money! Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sexy feet

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not too adhesive
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough. In all fairness my otter box keeps it from getting the best grip since it’s not sticking directly to phone, but that said this really is not that adhesive. Cute design! Just wish I could get it to stay
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable! Easy exchange
customer_reviews.text: I originally got a pop socket with a white background, but decided to change to this one so it wouldn’t look as dirty so fast. I got this in the mail and it kept falling off my phone. I thought this was strange, because the white one, I had to work at to get it to come off. I just returned it and they sent me another of the black one and it is working GREAT! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I actually had to order this twice. The first time it broke in less than 24 hours. I was able to return it and receive a new one for free. The print on the back of it was not centered and while i was jogging around my neighborhood the pop socket flew off. Very cheap product. Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible it sticks at first and then within 10 minutes it falls off. You open it and it comes apart. Wish i would have saved my money.
customer_reviews.author: tiffanie placeres

customer_reviews.title: Popsockets rock!
customer_reviews.text: Popsockets are awesome. If you’ve tried other brands and they’re junk, before you give up on the concept, give a Popsocket a try! You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Nad

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Took a week and a half to arrive. No issues yet and it's been 2 weeks6. Adhesive still good. I'll update once it starts messing up.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Estella

customer_reviews.title: There are SIX of them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pop socket and received a small box containing SIX of them. I mean, it's a good price for six, but a) I never saw anywhere on this page that I was ordering 6 of them, b) I still can't find anywhere that it says I'd get 6 of them, and no one else has mentioned that, and c) while it's a good price for 6 pop sockets, what the hell will I do with the other five?? Am I the only one who got six products?
customer_reviews.author: Christine Engelen

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this cute design. I’ve had mine on for a long time and the adhesion is still strong. Super easy to hold my phone to watch videos, play games or every day use of holding it. Glad I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Camy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, and stuck them both on 2 different phone, they stuck on for about 5 mins. They are not sticky at all!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart while expanding I popped it back in but did not last very long. Was comfortable to hold but horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Pretty design
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Durable- stuck it on my phone over 2 months ago and it hasn't moved yet. Nice to have a better grip.
customer_reviews.author: Mowlee

product_meta.title: PopSockets: Collapsible Grip & Stand for Phones and Tablets - Peace Mandala Sky
product_meta.description: A PopSockets grip is more than a stylish phone accessory. It’s an opposable thumb for your phone. It lets you take selfies like a pro and share with your circle of fans, friends or embarrassing family members. It lets you text things you may or may not later regret with the greatest of ease. It lets you stand your phone up on an airplane tray table to watch a movie. When you’re done, it collapses flat like your bangs in a rainstorm. PopSockets grips are repositionable and stick to most devices and cases but may not stick to silicone or waterproof materials. The product includes a special 3M adhesive disc for attaching your grip directly to a glass-backed phone. You may also buy a separate “mount” to attach your phone to your dashboard, mirror, refrigerator, air conditioning vent or wherever you snack on content. Mmm…content. And now, a little something for all you specification geeks: Diameter: 1.56 inches, Height: .9 inches when expanded, .25 inches when collapsed. PopSockets offers its customers a limited, 3-year warranty on its products from the date of purchase. For full warranty details, please contact PopSockets.
feature_bullets: Offers a secure grip so you can text with one hand, snap better photos, and stop phone drops
Functions as a convenient stand so you can watch videos on the fly
Allows for hands-free use with the PopSockets mount
Available in a broad range of styles and materials

Advanced reusable adhesive: repositionable, washable adhesive sticks to most cases, won't stick to silicone/highly textured cases. Packaging includes adhesive disc to apply directly to iPhone & other glass back phones
Easily remove the top to wireless charging

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars2,967 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
